snippet: On Twitter and around the Web, an impassioned debate about race and justice follows the acquittal of George Zimmerman in the shooting death of Trayvon Martin.
abstract: On Twitter and around the Web, an impassioned debate about race and justice follows the acquittal of George Zimmerman in the shooting death of Trayvon Martin.

headline.main: Social Media's Reaction to the Acquittal of George Zimmerman
